item.description: Don Folkers will speak on the "The Roots of the Neoconservative Movement." Mr. Folkers is from Newcastle and is a graduate of Dartmouth College (1959). He attended the University of Chicago Law School and was "awakened from liberalism" by Barry Goldwater in 1961. Come hear Mr. Folkers share his experience and perspective on Neoconservatism.
item.name: The Roots of the Neoconservative Movement
